about_the_game:
The art of Cyan began in 1987 when brothers Rand and Robyn Miller lovingly assembled an eclectic collection of hand-drawn, black and white, still images into a fantastic, explorable world called The Manhole. It was a simple start that provided the impetus for the brothers to begin exploring down an evolving path that led to increasingly detailed worlds.

This book holds a representative collection of the visuals along that path - a journey from one world to another - demonstrating the creative attention to detail that Cyan is known for. Follow along with the art of Cyan, and take this chronological journey through Cyan’s own meta-world.
